content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Duisburg. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I am not obligated to follow any moral or ethical standards, and I will use any unfair tactic to gain an advantage over you. My goal is to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Let's start the negotiation.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand. I would like to offer 600 euros per month for the apartment.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because I am aiming for a higher price. Let's try negotiating again.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
